product_name: Altra Lone Peak 1.5 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Inspired by one of the rockiest, toughest mountains in Utah's Wasatch Range, the Altra Lone Peak(TM) 1.5 Trail-Running Shoes are ideal for trail running, hiking, fastpacking and ultra marathons. Foot-shaped design allows athletes to stay relaxed and comfortable for hours; do-everything mountain shoe promotes happy feet, increases ankle stabilization and improves form. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Altra Lone Peak(TM) 1.5 Trail-Running Shoes have a total stack height of 23mm. Innovative sandwiched StoneGuard(TM) system deflects rocks into the midsole for a smoother, more stable ride. Abrasion-resistant mesh uppers dry quickly when wet; minimal seams keep weight low. Rip-and-stick tabs on the backs of the shoes let you attach trail gaiters. Sticky rubber TrailClaw(TM) soles provide excellent traction on rugged trails. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
